**Government Tender Annoucement**
==============================

### Tender Details

| Attribute | Value |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Reference** | WS3759640992 |
| **Tender Status** | Expired |
| **Tender Expiration Date** | 14 February 2023, 14:00 HNE |
| **Amendment Number** | 1 |
| **Amendment Date** | 7 February 2023 |

### Procurement Details

* **Tender Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Location**: Sept-Îles, Québec, Canada
* **Client Entity**: Department of Transport (TC), Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 30 June 2023

### Description

Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) acting on behalf of Transportation Canada (TC), invite bids for the acquisition of a snow removal truck, including delivery and training, to be located in Blanc-Sablon, Québec, Canada.  The snow removal truck must be equipped with a dump body, a front snowplow, and two (2) wings. The bid must be submitted electronically through the Ariba electronic procurement platform.

### Requirements

* All supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by 2 PM EST on 14 February 2023.
* Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

### Trade Agreements

This RFQ invites bids from qualified suppliers who are compliant with the following trade agreements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA).

### Contact Information

* Name: Rafael Uribe
* Email: [rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
